channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Warrior
channel.description:
Based off of ToS' Werewolf, but slightly different, this is the Warrior, a traumatized soldier who returns to Castle Adiart shaken and paranoid.
[quote]
**The Warrior**
**_Passives_**
Former Soldier: Immune to death at night and will appear as a Knight to all faction checks.
**_Abilities_**
**Berserk:** (Unlimited) (Night) (1-Day Cooldown) Choose a player. You will attack them and all players who visit them.
**Paranoia:** (Unlimited) (Night) Stay at home. You will be occupy immune tonight and kill all players who visit you. Bypasses night immunity. [/quote]
